title: State v. Shaurn Thomas – Addendum 2 – The Usual Suspects
description:
September 28, 2017 / Addendum host Jon Cryer is joined by Rabia Chaudry and James Figorski, one of Shaun Thomas’ lawyers.

Today’s addendum is supported by Audible.

Start a 30-day trial and your first audiobook is free. Go to www.audible.com/undisclosed. 

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

#undisclosed  #shaunthomas #udaddendum
